FuncDef: The display mpls l2vpn oam-mapping command displays BGP VPWS OAM mapping information.
Examples: Interface             Active CE-ID/RMT  VC-status AC-OAM  BFD-for-PW
<HUAWEI> display mpls l2vpn oam-mapping interface gigabitethernet 1/0/0.1
BFD for LSP    : --    TunnelNum: --    PSN State : --
BFD for LSP    : --    TunnelNum: --    PSN State : --
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In a BGP VPWS scenario, after the mpls l2vpn oam-mapping command is run on a PE, a mapping between PW OAM status and AC OAM status is automatically created. To check OAM mapping information, run the display mpls l2vpn oam-mapping command.
Precautions
If PW OAM or AC OAM has not been configured when the display mpls l2vpn oam-mapping command is run, no information will be displayed.
